heading: Canons, fugues, etc..
general-note: Here are entered collections of canons, fugues, and similar compositions for various mediums of performance. Individual canons, fugues, etc. and collections of canons, fugues, etc. for a specific medium of performance are entered under the heading followed by the medium. Works about canon as a musical form are entered under the heading. Canon (Musical form).. Works about the fugue are entered under the heading. Fugue..
